verses.verse: At that time, <S%H6256><s%> Merodach Baladan <S%H1081><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baladan, <S%H1081><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H5612><s%> and a present <S%H4503><s%> to Hezekiah; <S%H2396><s%> for he heard <S%H8085><s%> that he had been sick, <S%H2470><s%> and had recovered. <S%H2388><s%>

Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> was pleased <S%H8055><s%> with them, <S%H7200><s%> and showed them the house <S%H1004><s%> of his precious things, <S%H5238><s%> the silver, <S%H3701><s%> and the gold, <S%H2091><s%> the spices, <S%H1314><s%> and the precious <S%H2896><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of his armor, <S%H3627><s%> and all that was found <S%H4672><s%> in his treasures. <S%H214><s%> There was nothing <S%H1697><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> nor in all his dominion, <S%H4475><s%> that Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> didn't <S%H7200><s%> show them.

Then Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to king <S%H4428><s%> Hezekiah, <S%H2396><s%> and asked <S%H559><s%> him, <S%H582><s%> "What did these men say? <S%H559><s%> Where <S%H370><s%> did they come <S%H935><s%> from to you? <S%H2396><s%>" Hezekiah said, <S%H559><s%> "They have come <S%H935><s%> from a country <S%H776><s%> far <S%H7350><s%> from me, <S%H894><s%> even from Babylon."

Then he asked, <S%H559><s%> "What have they seen <S%H7200><s%> in your house? <S%H1004><s%>" Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> answered, <S%H559><s%> "They have seen <S%H7200><s%> all that is in my house. <S%H1004><s%> There is nothing <S%H1697><s%> among my treasures <S%H214><s%> that I have not shown them. <S%H7200><s%>"
Then Isaiah <S%H3470><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Hezekiah, <S%H2396><s%> "Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%>

<S%H3117><s%> 'Behold, the days are coming <S%H935><s%> when all that is in your house, <S%H1004><s%> and that which your fathers <S%H1><s%> have stored <S%H686><s%> up until this day, <S%H3117><s%> will be carried <S%H5375><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%> Nothing <S%H1697><s%> will be left, <S%H3498><s%>' says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H3947><s%> 'They will take away your sons <S%H1121><s%> who will issue <S%H3318><s%> from you, <S%H3205><s%> whom you shall father, and they will be eunuchs <S%H5631><s%> in the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>'s palace. <S%H1964><s%>'"

Then Hezekiah <S%H2396><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Isaiah, <S%H3470><s%> "Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s word <S%H1697><s%> which you have spoken <S%H1696><s%> is good. <S%H2896><s%>" He said <S%H559><s%> moreover, <S%H7965><s%> "For there will be peace and truth <S%H571><s%> in my days. <S%H3117><s%>"
